docs.title: About
docs.text: A schema for detailed diagnostic outputs from RESNET® Accredited HERS® software tools.

docs.title: JSON Schema
docs.text:
Schema

Description

HERS Diagnostic Output

A schema for detailed diagnostic outputs from RESNET® Accredited HERS software tools.

docs.title: HERSDiagnosticOutput
docs.text:

Description

Data Type

Units

Constraints

Req

Notes

metadata

ASHRAE Standard 232P metadata

schema=HERS_DIAGNOSTIC_OUTPUT

$✓$

Name of the file or project used to generate this data

String

$✓$

Supplementary descriptive information about the home

String

Name of the software used to generate this data

String

$✓$

Version of the software used to generate this data

String

$✓$

weather_data_location

Descriptive name of the weather data location

String

$✓$

For example: City, town, or airport name.

State

String

"[A-Z]{2}"

$✓$

Conditioned floor area

Numeric

ft^2^

>0

$✓$

Number of bedrooms

≥1

$✓$

Number of above-grade stories

Integer

≥1

$✓$

Numeric

-

$✓$

-
